name: Innovation In Behavioral Health
objective:
The CMS Innovation Center is announcing a new NOFO focusing on improving the quality of
care for people with behavioral health needs.
top_agency_name: Department of Health and Human Services
sub_agency_name: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services

authorizations.text:
Social Security Act, section 1115A

Section 1115A of the Social Security Act (the Act) establishes CMMI to test innovative health care payment and service delivery models that have the potential to lower Medicare, Medicaid, and CHIP spending while maintaining or improving the quality of beneficiaries’ care.
